summary: This mod adds a new lore friendly custom Armor to the game
descriptionHtml:
This is a Nexus Exclusive Mod, don\'t reupload it anywhere!

The Ancient Warrior Armor and my personal Dragonborn Harkon. Don\'t forged to Endorse and/or vote! :D
[URL=http://www.pic-upload.de/view-17685178/5142762-1357070956.png.html][IMG]http://www7.pic-upload.de/12.01.13/bl12h7nhee.png[/IMG][/URL]
This mod adds the ancient warrior armor to the game. You can craft it at any forge. There are 2 versions, light and heavy. To craft the Armor set you need leather, leather strips and iron ingots. 
Stenvar isn\'t longer in the game. there is a new follower: my personal Dragonborn Harkon.
you can find him in windhelms tavern.
And don\'t forget to endorse and vote for it :)

Here can you take a look on the armor: http://p3d.in/CP6dz
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Reviews:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requires: 
Dawnguard DLC  : No
Hearthfire DLC   : No
Dragonborn DLC : No
SKSE: No
Latest Skyrimpatch: yes
A legal version of Skyrim: of course!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Permissions:
If you wish to use this armor set for your mod, please ask me by message first.
Don\'t upload this mod anywhere without my permissions.
If you want to create a translation of this mod, please ask me by message first.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Crafting:
Steel section:
Boots- 2 leather strips, 2 leather
Cuirass- 3 leather strips, 4 leather
Gloves- 2 leather strips, 1 leather
Hood- 2 leather strips, 1 leather

Misc section:
Pauldron left- 3 leather strips, 4 leather, 4 iron ingots
Pauldron right- 3 leather strips, 4 leather
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changelog:
1.0: 1st Release
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Bugs: Beast races can\'t wear the helmet atm. there is a fixed esp file next time.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits:
Witcher5688- Design 
Jehoram- testing and take screenshots
Northborn- creating the short version of the Hood
Bethesda for creating this wonderful game
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update-History:
1.0: Release
1.1: Female Hood and Beast Race Fix
1.2: Adding Temper files to the armor, so it must be now temperable
author: Witcher5688 and Jehoram
